script
start !style_error(Unknown construction message:) Exception: scriptTable_1_0 adhocmanagement Test not run


Narrative

In order to reboot devices As a platform I want to asynchronously handle set reboot requests

NOTE: Authorisation is tested in Basic OSGP Functions - PBI119

Implemented Scenarios:

  • Set reboot
  • Resume schedule for unknown / unregistered device

Scenario: Set reboot

scenario input values device status ismessagesent result description
given a set reboot request for device @device
and the set reboot request refers to a device @device with status @status
and the set reboot request refers to an organisation that is authorised
when the set reboot request is received
then the set reboot request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId @device
and a set reboot oslp message is sent to device @device should be @ismessagesent
and an ovl set reboot result message with result @result and description @description should be sent to the ovl out queue

input values
device status ismessagesent result description
device-01 active true OK
scenario input values device status ismessagesent result description
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a set reboot request for device device-01
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the set reboot request refers to a device device-01 with status active
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the set reboot request refers to an organisation that is authorised
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the set reboot request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the set reboot request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a set reboot oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist an ovl set reboot result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue

Parameters:

  • device: device identification
  • status: active, unknown, unregistered, ???
  • isgenerated: boolean (true/false) indicating whether a correlationID is generated
  • isqueued: boolean (true/false) indicating whether a message is added to the queue
  • result: OK (correlationID is returned) or exception


Scenario: Receive A Get Set Reboot Response Request

scenario get set reboot response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given a get set reboot response request with correlationId @correlationid and deviceId @deviceid
and a set reboot response message with correlationId @correlationid, deviceId @deviceid2, qresult @qresult and qdescription @qdescription is found in the queue @isfound
when the get set reboot response request is received
then the get set reboot response request should return a set reboot response with result @result and description @description

get set reboot response input values
correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
cid-01 dvc-01 true dvc-01 OK OK
scenario get set reboot response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a get set reboot response request with correlationId cid-01 and deviceId dvc-01
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a set reboot response message with correlationId cid-01, deviceId dvc-01, qresult OK and qdescription is found in the queue true
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the get set reboot response request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the get set reboot response request should return a set reboot response with result OK and description
cid-02 dvc-01 false NOT_FOUND
scenario get set reboot response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a get set reboot response request with correlationId cid-02 and deviceId dvc-01
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a set reboot response message with correlationId cid-02, deviceId , qresult and qdescription is found in the queue false
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the get set reboot response request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the get set reboot response request should return a set reboot response with result NOT_FOUND and description
cid-03 dvc-01 true dvc-01 NOT_OK VALIDATION ERROR NOT_OK VALIDATION ERROR
scenario get set reboot response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a get set reboot response request with correlationId cid-03 and deviceId dvc-01
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a set reboot response message with correlationId cid-03, deviceId dvc-01, qresult NOT_OK and qdescription VALIDATION ERROR is found in the queue true
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the get set reboot response request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the get set reboot response request should return a set reboot response with result NOT_OK and description VALIDATION ERROR

Parameters:

  • correlationId: correlation Id returned from a set reboot request
  • content: message content
  • result: OK or exception
